website_summaries.verdict: Tops its competitors for power, performance, and feature set. This is a sound investment that will save you money in the long run.
pros: Combines Dyson's renowned swivel ball maneuverability and Radial Root Cyclone technology for easy operation and deep cleaning
cons: It's more expensive than many other pet vacuums, but you get a lot of performance for the price

customer_reviews.title: Really pleased....
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent vacuum cleaner and is very good for pet hairs, I am also very pleased with the Multi-Floor aspect, it works far better than I expected, if I'm honest. Like some others, I have found it a little more difficult to manoeuvre, compared to my previous roller-ball. I have found however, that turning down the suction resolves this. The design of the nozzle attachment is much better, far less likely to get clogged up, like the last one did, and I also prefer the way it comes apart to use the extension pipe for stairs etc. It does feel a little flimsier than the last one, I guess time will tell on that...
customer_reviews.author: TJB Paws

customer_reviews.title: Dyson Cinetic Big Ball
customer_reviews.text: So strong, the first use produced an embarrassing amount of dirt that my older Dyson hadn’t been picking up. Carpets look renewed, which is great. Heavy but quite quiet, so the dog doesn’t bark now while I’m vacuuming. But this is not the model I ordered - it’s silver with red instead of silver with blue and I think the price should have been less. No explanation attached, so I’m confused, but happy with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: F. A. Rodner

customer_reviews.title: Just one Ball....
customer_reviews.text: The DC 41 is Seriously powerful. Old DC 24 got past its best. Filled the new one up just doing the lounge and dining room carpet. Twice! On the downside, the thing is hefty to shove around with full suction, especially on the hard floor setting, it almost sticks to the floor. I think Mr Dyson has revisited the stupid "Ball" idea once too often. It doesn't offer any real world advantage over wheels. How many Ballbarrows are there now? Quite!
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Shaw

customer_reviews.title: ... not coping with dog hair which is black and fine. Researched lots of different makes and models and ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a very old dyson that was not coping with dog hair which is black and fine. Researched lots of different makes and models and went for this one. Suction much better and what I need. Got used to how to put hose away - worth reading instructions!
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Unfit for my use
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10year old Dyson Animal and wished to replace it with the same. The DC41 worked very well on the carpet, but on my heavy persian rug, I found it very difficult to move, unlike my old model. I called in a Dyson engineer who confirmed that this model cannot be used on rugs! As I have many rugs around the house, I have had to send the vacuum back to Amazon for a refund. Very disappointing, particularly as this problem is not mentioned in any advertising literature. Full marks to Amazon on their "return" system.
customer_reviews.author: Ferne D Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. I have had dysons and always been delighted
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I have had dysons and always been delighted, this one whilst still has excellent suction is difficult to manoeuvre, poor build quality compared to early models, handle feels very flimsy and a part snapped off on the1st use. I have had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dyson Support
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on Amazon in 2014, very pleased initially but have had three separate faults with it since... first there was a problem with the main head, then the motor overheated and blew, then finally the motor overheated again and kept cutting out on thermal overload. Contacted Dyson on each occasion who were prompt to visit and rectify repairs.... the last problem they decided to give me a new DC41 under the 5 year guarantee 3 years in and start with a fresh 5 years guarantee... excellent support from Dyson but feel there may be an inherent problem with motors
customer_reviews.author: John W Redfern

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Great service. Arrived swiftly and at a really good price. The Dyson itself is incredibly powerful but like its predecessors the tools are a bit cumbersome to use.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mullan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this new Dyson. The hose too short to do stairs, the plug cable not flexible, so constantly getting knotted and caught on things. I think this will be my last dyson.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: A beast of a machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine is absolutely second to none. Had the DC25 which I thought was doing the job very well until the suction motor went on it. Although it was still under guarantee I ordered the newer DC41 and we are now using the DC25 for the summer house, car etc. The DC41 is a major improvement. I had only hoovered the day before my new machine had been delivered and I went through my lounge in amazement as the drum filled up before I'd finished one room. Believe me, it will not dissapoint. Excellent purchase and worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: jan.04

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived I plugged it in to make sure it worked. Then I realised it was too heavy for an 80 year old like me so I planned to return it. Now I see that because I turned it on I cannot return it. Poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: PRISCILLA GRAY

customer_reviews.title: A very good vacuum cleaner which copes equally well on carpeted & hard floors.
customer_reviews.text: Suction is good on both soft & hard floors & the ability to stop the brushes means that dirt on hard floors is not pushed away. The DC41A is lighter than other Dysons we have had & the motor, whilst not quiet, has a less intrusive tone. 2 accessories can be stored on the machine & are easy to use. The only minor quibble is with the storage/transport rollers which keep the machine upright but fold away too readily when wheeling the machine about. Overall we like it.
customer_reviews.author: Norbs

customer_reviews.title: Items comes with Tangle Free Tool !
customer_reviews.text: We did a lot of research prior to choosing this model; it is a very good vacuum cleaner; we also purchased additional tools to go with it. The description needs to be modified as it DOES include the tangle free turbine head! Time will tell just how good this product is, in case we've been given a better deal than was quoted would suggest if you are buying this model; waiting until it arrives to check which version of the turbine head you've received.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Has brought up carpets like new.
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic cleaner. Embarrassed by amount of dirt it lifted from my carpets despite it having been vacuumed daily with my old machine. Its brought the pile back up on my carpets and you can actually see footprints in the carpet as a result of this. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Mendham

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased - does exactly what it says on the tin!! Had Dyson for years, recently 'strayed' to Kirby which lasted all of two months before I replaced it with another Dyson. The mini turbo head (also known as tangle free brush) is excellent at removing dog hairs from their beds - I have two German Shepherds. I'd personally put the Dyson up against the Kirby any day yet it's far cheaper, a lot lighter and more manoeuvrable. What more can I say apart from you really can't go wrong with a Dyson
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Come Hoovering with the Disco Dyson.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and securely packaged.The performance is excellent as with most Dyson products.My only issue is with the locking mechanism. When you wish to secure it in the upright position to clean stairs,or release it to clean flooring;it reminds me of my grandmothers maiden voyage into the world of breakdancing!Hence the four stars in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: johnnyboy

customer_reviews.title: So £260 spent was wasted!
customer_reviews.text: It picks up well, therefore the two stars. It was second hand but although it was meant to be reconditioned I found that it would not remain in the upright position and the bagless container continually falls off, obviously there must be a lot of wear on the plastic clipping. I have now had my broken Dyson repaired - £13 for a new motor and £20 to put it all back together again. So £260 spent was wasted!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jacqueline Miller

customer_reviews.title: Dyson Animal Upright
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realise my old Dyson didn't pick up as much as it should until I used the new one. Feels flimsier than my old one which lasted for 15 years but only time will tell if this one lasts as long.
customer_reviews.author: Mo57

customer_reviews.title: An amazing piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: This picks up every single dog hair ever, and I have four dogs! Took me a little while to get used to the ball and it is a little heavy but again you get used to it. My only 'little' gripe is you really have to push it into the upright position when not using and it does not always click into place - it then topples over, having said that I would strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Have had dysons before and did a bit of research, so pleased I picked this one, I have twowhite dogs which moult and chocolate carpets and hard floors . I never realised how bad my floors actually were until I used this, the difference is amazing. Yes it leaves tram lines on carpets as other people have mentioned but does this really matter? To me my house feels cleaner. Great product highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Grange

customer_reviews.title: Very good suction, have to empty the cylinder frequently
customer_reviews.text: Very good suction, have to empty the cylinder frequently. The catch to release from upright to vacuuming position appears to be not very sturdy and it makes you think you are damaging the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to manoeuvre- gets deep down dust out.
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with this product. Gets carpet really clean and easy to manoeuvre too.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs

customer_reviews.title: Dirt
customer_reviews.text: I received the hoover which is a second hand one, but I would have expected this item to have been cleaned. I had to do this myself which I feel is not acceptable as this came from a supplier not a household.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye pet hairs !
customer_reviews.text: I have used Dyson cleaners since shortly afrter I saw their new concept cleaner on ' Tomorro's World ' many years ago. This DC 41 is, arguably. the best so far. A fine example of Dyson's ongoing research and developement policy which drives their search for ' betterment '
customer_reviews.author: Jon Kay

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended. Used it for the first time on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. Used it for the first time on a "clean" carpet and the amount of dust and dog hairs that were sucked up was truly amazing. Our previous Hoover bagless we thought was good but the Dyson shows how mistaken you can be, the "boss" is well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J.B. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and value
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Dyson DC41 Animal after being impressed with the same model our daughter bought last November . Not only is it a very effective vacumn for lifting cat fur off carpets and other surfaces, the hose has a very long reach which is ideal for the stairs without the need to carry the cleaner with you. We were also amazed with the saving of over £150 by buying from Amazon, as opposed to a local outlet in Jersey . Excellent buy and
customer_reviews.author: ChevyC5

customer_reviews.title: Suction usual quality
customer_reviews.text: I have two collies who love to drop their fur on my nice clean carpet.Suction usual Dyson excellence .One star gone because I am losing wrist strength and the manoeuvring of the ball is quite heavy.Otherwise really happy with this machine
customer_reviews.author: Janf

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: It's meant to pick up animal hair, which as we all know gets everywhere and can be tricky to pick up. No issues with this one though as it's very powerful. It extruded my cat through it's system, which means no more cat hair (yay!). I will however have to buy another one (a hoover I mean).
customer_reviews.author: AMyd666

customer_reviews.title: Another good vac from Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Another good vac from Dyson. I use it and i am pleased with it,s performance. A more flexible hose might improve it more.
customer_reviews.author: John A.

customer_reviews.title: Dyson by far the best
customer_reviews.text: A great vacuum it lasted just shy of 2 years and the motor went but one quick call to Dyson customer service and they are replacing it they don't even want to try and fix it, the customer service is second to none I would certainly buy from Dyson again
customer_reviews.author: david wood

customer_reviews.title: Train tracks
customer_reviews.text: The machine cleans beautifully, my carpets must have been very dirty! I do get the train tracks though and will be contacting Dyson regarding this. I will repost when I have a result and hopefully five stars.
customer_reviews.author: chrish

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job with all the animal hair
customer_reviews.text: So smooth from carpet to hard floor. So much quieter than our previous hoover! Does a great job with all the animal hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsty Young

customer_reviews.title: Great suction ideal for pet hair
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product great suction. Took while to get used to maneuvering it around with ball but easy when you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Had Dysons before, and this doesn't disappoint love the ball design plus strong suction, very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Dyson DC41
customer_reviews.text: Took me a while to get used to the movement of the 'ball' but it certainly does navigate quite well around furniture and corners. Picks up dust and fluff well and am impressed by its ability to deal with pet hair. However, the machine leaves rather strange stripes on the carpet which is a little bit unsightly. ( At least people can see that I've actually hoovered!!)
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good suction cord not long enough keeps falling over when using hose feels flimsy compared to previous dysons
customer_reviews.author: MS L STEVENS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum
customer_reviews.text: What can I say other than its a Dyson. Excellent vacuum. May be a little heavier than my previous but once you press the button and start it feels so much lighter. Excellent vacuum. Well done Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: S. L. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if you can afford to
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and a bit heavy but it sucks so hard you'll really see just how much dirt you've lifted from even an apparently clean carpet
customer_reviews.author: P S Gander

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum we've had
customer_reviews.text: Best vacuum we have owned by a mile . Previously had other well known makes (inc a dyson) this is far superior
customer_reviews.author: Steve A.

customer_reviews.title: great performance.
customer_reviews.text: great performance ... fitting the handle extension back into place beat me a few times...theres a knack and I dont use it enough to get used to it but my weekly cleaning lady loves Dyson and loves this one too :-)
customer_reviews.author: Judith W.

customer_reviews.title: Dyson DC41
customer_reviews.text: this dyson is wonderful for pet hair and reaches all edges, delighted with performance, however, it is VERY heavy to use, and you have to get used to manoevering the ball. there is no way i can carry it upstairs on my own to do the bedrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Ja Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Did not fail to impress
customer_reviews.text: Having owned one Dyson already I was expecting great things but this is such an effective cleaner. The ball took a little getting used to but now the cleaning is done in no time at all. 13 year old son even offers to do the hoovering!
customer_reviews.author: pneedham

customer_reviews.title: The best upright i have ever had first class great suction ...
customer_reviews.text: The best upright i have ever had first class great suction easy to move around and more than enough hose reach.a differant league from others.will probably look at other dyson products now
customer_reviews.author: Harry Paterson

customer_reviews.title: didnt know what would turn up but more than happy with the bargain I got really great hover even ...
customer_reviews.text: Was abit sceptical when I first ordered because of the low price, didnt know what would turn up but more than happy with the bargain I got really great hover even better price great seller 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent power, rather cumbersome (heavy) but the performance overides this slight moan.
customer_reviews.author: diddly

customer_reviews.title: Dyson DC41 Animal
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely marvellous!! I've owned several Dysons and have always been very pleased with them. However, when the last one died my daughter talked me into getting a Henry. Whilst not a bad vacuum, it doesn't cope with the amount of fur two cats can shed. I took delivery of the DC41 today and already the house looks better. The pet hair tool made short shrift of the cat blankets. I thoroughly recommend this vacuum
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Sc Potter

customer_reviews.title: Everything you'd expect of a Dyson
customer_reviews.text: This is our fourth Dyson model - each new model has pleased. The Animal is first class. It took me a while to adjust to the new driving mode (!) but have now sussed it. Very pleased and would definitely recommend this version to others. Copes well with shedding hair from two large dogs.
customer_reviews.author: KB Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Dyson DC41 Animal
customer_reviews.text: I have used Dyson in the past and that's why I decided to buy the DC41 for my other house in Santorini. It is simply the best all around vacuum cleaner with no comparison to others as far as suction, ease of use, flexibility( carpet, hard floor, furniture) with the only draw back the small canister but I can live with that when I consider the amazing performance.
customer_reviews.author: gregm

customer_reviews.title: Good hoover though
customer_reviews.text: A bit hard to push around, i thought it would be lighter. Good hoover though.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Strong vacuum, a bit heavy, tends to break down a bit.
customer_reviews.text: Good suction power, but has had 3-4 breakdown in 2 years. 5-year warranty is a must (luckily service is really good - which is the only reason I've not ruled Dyson out for next time).
customer_reviews.author: PhishStix

customer_reviews.title: Great that it has an extra long lead saves plenty ...
customer_reviews.text: The Dyson DC41 is a powerful and cleans on all surfaces. The only downside is that it is quite heavy but you do get use to this. Great that it has an extra long lead saves plenty of hassle. Very good product
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Another Dyson that I wished I had not purchased! Awful hoover in every way!
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Dyson
customer_reviews.text: The best vacuum cleaner I have ever owned, the suction is so powerful it requires a effort to push it over the longer pile
customer_reviews.author: BARRY JOHN RADFORDMr

customer_reviews.title: Dyson DC41
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this machine a short time & i very pleased with my choice of machine. I bought it to replace my DC3. This is a great choice, expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. I have loved all of my dyson vacuums in the past but this one is way to heavy to push. Spend less and buy the lighter version. I wish I would have.
customer_reviews.author: Leah A. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant! 1 Delighted with this Dyson and it certainly ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant!1 Delighted with this Dyson and it certainly does pick up everything. Love the tools too!
customer_reviews.author: Norman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent service, arrived dead on time - great vacuum too
customer_reviews.author: westbrook

customer_reviews.title: dyson animal cleaner
customer_reviews.text: comes partly assembled took time to assemble once all fitted togethertested,excelent suction multi purpose tools very good,easy to empty very good cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: washer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum. Little overpriced and therefore not exceptional value in my view.
customer_reviews.author: tonyp

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic suction
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Dyson we have had. This new model is better than the old model. Only small niggle is the weight - heavy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shipway

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine
customer_reviews.text: Far more agile than the previous Dyson we have had. The powered head really works well in cleaning the carpets, along with the extra suction, the cleaner has extracted far more stuff out of the carpets than we could imagine. The additional animal hair head works fantastically well.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: problem with the cleaner head
customer_reviews.text: The cleaner head actually gets stuck on some carpets, even making dents, it doesn't seem to self adjust properly. It occurs particularly on the short pile carpet (partly wool) I have in one of my bedrooms. One good point: the handling round table legs is great in comparison to my old dc01 (bought in 1998).
customer_reviews.author: solen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing ability to pick up dirt, tad on the heavy side. But works a dream.
customer_reviews.author: JP-B

customer_reviews.title: hoover is good price aint
customer_reviews.text: The hoover itself is really good as for the price well I did search online and to be honest amazon came up with the cheapest price but have since seen it remarkably cheaper in the shops themselves all the same for only having it a few weeks it does as it says on the tin but let's just wait and see what like in a years time.
customer_reviews.author: mr g j macleod

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Thought machine looked 'flimsy' when I first unpacked it but it works well and makes light work of dog hairs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Duguid

customer_reviews.title: Works of Mr Dyson
customer_reviews.text: my first thought was will it lift cats hair of a carpet, Dyson gave a summary of its capability's, on the strength of that I made a purchase, well it really works after one run over the carpets it had removed all the hair and left it very clean, good work Mr Dyson
customer_reviews.author: D.A.MORRISON

customer_reviews.title: A very good vacuum .
customer_reviews.text: This a very strong motor with plenty of suck. It has a rather different way of operating, with its one large circular wheel. It takes a little getting used to. It is very easy to empty, and not too heavy
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Been using a VAX cleaner for last few years, it looked like it was picking the pet hairs up (3 cats) This cleaner is far superior & carpets look visibly cleaner, easy to use & push around, only downside is rear castors leave lines in the carpet but these spring back & settle on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Coronafall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - powerful - efficient
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased - it took hardly any putting together and everything clicks into place. The carpets look like new and as usual with a new Dyson, it pulled out so much dust and fluff that the previous vacuum wasn't capable ot picking up. Highly recommended - not too heavy and so easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: ENIG321

customer_reviews.title: Diapointed
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed, my old Dyson was sturdy and strong. This model has thin cheap plastic and is insubstantial, it is not well designed and poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: J.P.Short

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I found it very difficult to hover high pile carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money, better then expected would recomend this product to anyone, could be slightly heavy with the handle in the low position, but very easy to guide around corners and obsticals.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Knight

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The hoover makes a whistling noise and doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dyson dc41
customer_reviews.text: like all dysons products they do what they say they can do, this is our fourth dyson product we have bought and every one has been 100% if your thinking of buying one go for it
customer_reviews.author: p nye   charbruc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Made such a difference cleaning up after a dog
customer_reviews.author: Demmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Early days but working perfectly - bit lighter than previous model.
customer_reviews.author: PCW

customer_reviews.title: Dyson DC41
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, works amazingly, picks up more than the old Dyson and is so much easier to move around with the ball thing. Feels a bit more flimsy with the plastic wand but doesn't seem to effect it and it has a good warranty just in case.
customer_reviews.author: MR P WHITTLE

customer_reviews.title: Great all round cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: A great cleaner! Easy to use, long flex, reaches up the stairs which was a worry initially! Not too heavy and good set of tools provided! Easy to empty! I have no problem at all with this cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: as good as promised
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and really picks up the dirt and fluff. still heavy when carrying upstairs but would still recommend it
customer_reviews.author: mary simpson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Superb performance. Only drawbacks - seems to need unnecessary aggression to return to upright position and the power lead is long and can get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona Ross

customer_reviews.title: good and bad
customer_reviews.text: Excellent suction, especially on carpets...but very heavy and not so easy to manoeuvre. My right arm was aching after 20 mins of vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: CAROLINE S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Vacuum Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, Excellent suction.You do have to make sure it is fixed in upright position before letting go of handle as it can fall over. Overall I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: JaneC

customer_reviews.title: Dyson DC41 animal dyson Ball Upright Vacuum Cleaner.
customer_reviews.text: After years of frustration and hard work using a very inefficient but expensive vacuum cleaner - I feel like I'm in 7th Heaven! This model is very powerful and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: A. Poole

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Quick efficient payment requiring no prompting or anything from me. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: GARETH

customer_reviews.title: The best in vacuum cleaners
customer_reviews.text: My Wife would not want to be without it as its the best thank you.She would recomend this cleaner to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Good all round product
customer_reviews.text: Pleasure to use, very good suction, I do not think the ball steering aspect is exceptional but over all a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: pw

customer_reviews.title: Dc41 animal
customer_reviews.text: Great product best vacume we've ever had early days yet but it is realy good so far only time will tell
customer_reviews.author: stephen hughes

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic suck, but a bit heavy
customer_reviews.text: Its hoovering ability is fantastic - almost sucks the carpet up. Only drawback - somewhat heavy for carting up the stairs
customer_reviews.author: geoff childs

customer_reviews.title: the Best Dyson yet
customer_reviews.text: we have had a number of Dysons over the years and ( in my opinion) this is the best yet. great cleaning power.
customer_reviews.author: Rob P

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Animal!
customer_reviews.text: Completely lived up to expectations. Brilliant. Is quite heavy but ball makes it very manoeuvrable. Would definitely recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: F Stevens

customer_reviews.title: to open or close handle is hard
customer_reviews.text: It picks up very well but to break it open or close it proves difficult and i feel I am being heavy handed achieving this
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as said. Brilliant clean.easy to use. Hubby loves it saves me hoovering up now. Cleans dog hairs up straight away first run
customer_reviews.author: paul gunston

customer_reviews.title: Dyson DC41
customer_reviews.text: The service I received was excellent. the Dyson works perfectly and I could not ask for better. This was the best price I could find anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: rita hammond

customer_reviews.title: a beast? in a nice way
customer_reviews.text: good machine good price good buy and goodbye, brevity is the soul of wit and less is more, more or less
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL A MASON

customer_reviews.title: excellent cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to replace my old Dyson, so bought this. It's so much more powerful and the lead is longer which is useful.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Rakic

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with the Dyson overall picks up far better than our older Dyson - Do however feel that one or two of the parts are particularly flimsy only time will tell
customer_reviews.author: tony heaton

customer_reviews.title: Replacement for the one we blew up!
customer_reviews.text: A great Dyson which picks up the dirt well but I find it quite heavy to move about and impossible to do in straight lines!
customer_reviews.author: Jane R

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's does what it says on the tin. It's good review on which is justified. It does stairs and there are no massive problems with it apart from one gimble that gets clogged with hair and is awkward to remove. Apart from this, if you have pets and don't want hair, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Old G1t

customer_reviews.title: Different
customer_reviews.text: Having had Dysons for years I must admit this is not as good as I expected. Compared with previous ones the advantages are easily manoeuvred , lightweight to use and much easier to empty. On the downside it feels very fragile to use and perhaps not as strong a suction as my last one. Maybe I will change my mind after more use.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. M. Mcbride

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: bought it as someone recommended it. But I still prefer my Henry Hoover. Yes light weight and easy to use but very expensive for what you get
